summary: This mod enhances the sounds of music instrument. I've edited the vanilla sounds for the lute, flute and drum.
descriptionHtml:
This mod enhances the sounds of music instrument. I've edited the vanilla sounds for the lute, flute and drum. These instruments do sound a lot more realistic now instead of the plain vanilla noises.

SSE version coming soon!

Comparison videos coming soon!



[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q&A[/size][/font]

Q: Is this mod compatible with other audio mods?
A: Yes it is. Just overwrite any other audio mods.




[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/font]

Bethesda Game Studios
[url=https://www.audacityteam.org/]Audacity Team[/url]
author: Smoothlias1
